column5: My Wife's uncle, passed away he was an avid fisherman his ashes will be spread over his favourite fishing spot, my wife agrees that instead of buying flowers we would like to do a small donation to a fishing organization.  On short notice can anyone recommend an organization that would do the most good with our donation? I don't have time to search this.  thanks
i'm a big fan of trout unlimited myself.
Casting for a Cure would be my choice/recommendation...  http://www.factsoffishing.com/castingforacure/
